patthana17.15:1.1: Kusalaṁ maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.15:2.1: Kusalaṁ maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.15:3.1: Kusalaṁ maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
